allow: Bash(CI=true mix test test/streampai_web/integration/application_startup_test.exs:"test application can start with all dependencies" --max-failures 1)
Bash(CI=true mix test test/streampai_web/integration/application_startup_test.exs:"test application startup application can start with all dependencies" --max-failures 1)

Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch --env-filter '
if [ ""$GIT_COMMITTER_NAME"" = ""Claude"" ]; then
    export GIT_COMMITTER_NAME=""Dawid Danieluk""
    export GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL=""danielukd@gmail.com""
fi
if [ ""$GIT_AUTHOR_NAME"" = ""Claude"" ]; then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_NAME=""Dawid Danieluk""
    export GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL=""danielukd@gmail.com""
fi
' --tag-name-filter cat -- --branches --tags)
